data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Chen, Szu-Lung, Yeh, Wen-Chi (2014): Description of a new species of the genus Sarasaeschna Karube & Yeh, with a key to the species of Taiwan (Odonata: Anisoptera: Aeshnidae). Zootaxa 3764 (1): 92-100, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.3764.1.6
